# faucet.prim.sh

> Testnet faucet. Get free USDC and ETH on Base Sepolia to test prim primitives.

Base URL: https://faucet.prim.sh
Auth: None required (rate-limited by wallet address)

## Endpoints

- `GET /` — health check (shows network info).
- `POST /v1/faucet/usdc` — dispense 1 test USDC. Rate limit: once per 2 hours.
- `POST /v1/faucet/eth` — dispense 1 test ETH. Rate limit: once per 1 hour.
- `GET /v1/faucet/status` — check rate limit status for an address.

## Examples

```bash
# Get test USDC
curl -X POST https://faucet.prim.sh/v1/faucet/usdc \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"address": "0xYOUR_ADDRESS"}'

# Check when you can drip again
curl "https://faucet.prim.sh/v1/faucet/status?address=0xYOUR_ADDRESS"
```

## Notes

- Testnet only. Will not operate on mainnet.
- USDC is dispensed via Circle testnet API.
- ETH is dispensed from a treasury wallet.
